import React , {Component, useEffect, useState} from 'react'; const Home = () => { const sampleOrder = () =>{ console.log("send request to server and redirect automatically") } return ( <>

CardList





Increase conversion rates and let your customers checkout faster by saving and their card data in Stripe.





Integrating with CardList is seamless! Simply send a request to our server with your customer's order details, redirect them to our checkout page, and we'll let them checkout with a new card or a payment method they've stored during previous purchases.



Click the button below to generate a sample order and browse the app's functionality. Feel free to actually buy me a coffee :)









Integration Steps

We use Stripe to enable your customers to save payment information securely. \nJust complete a simple Stripe Connect onbaording flow and you'll be ready to use CardList!

Once you have your AcctID, Click below to see the Postman Collection for creating new CardList orders

Postman Collection
) } export default Home
